No not another player home. But A place you can live. You have family(a distant

descriptionHtml:
Hedgewich Cottage: A PlayerAbode
   No not another player home. But A place you can live. You have family(a distant 
cousin or something) living in Riverwood. You haven\'t seen her in years. Not to 
worry she will welcome you. Her names Gredl. And from what you know she lives near 
Riverwood and is a HedgeWitch(ie. she sells potions and charms).
   Notes, to the Player: She likes sleeping in the main room by the fire. You are 
welcome to the Bedroom. There are two player chest there, and a bookcase.
Downstairs there is another plyr chest, enchanters table, and alchemy table.
Please leave the ingredients in/near the house alone. Forage for your own, she has 
a few to sell. Eat what you want. The place is Navmeshed. 

Location
   NW of riverwood, across the river. Exit Riverwood west. Look across the river.

Install 
   A .esp - place it in your data directory, make sure its ticked.

Log
  Version .22, basically complete. Will be adding dialog and more items later. 
Have another project in the works. Oh yeah, need a female voice for gredl. If 
interested email me please.

Thats about it --have fun-- Chaz_916
author: chaz916
